fieldUpdates.description: Field Update to concatenate existing notes with new notes
fieldUpdates.formula: ($User.FirstName) & " " & ($User.LastName) & " " & "- " & Text (MONTH(TODAY()))& "/" & Text (DAY(TODAY())) & "/" & Text (YEAR(TODAY())) & BR() & " " & ($User.FirstName)& "'s "& "Note: " & Log_a_note__c & BR() & BR() & BR() & PRIORVALUE(Deputy_Notes__c)
fieldUpdates.name: AddNotesfromLoganote

fieldUpdates.description: This field update is attached to a workflow rule that identifies cases set to the status "Unable to Pursue". When cases are set to "Unable to Pursue", this field update will update the record type to "BOFE Closed".
fieldUpdates.name: CM: Set Record Type To BOFE Closed

fieldUpdates.description: This field update attached to a workflow rule that identifies cases moved to the status of "Reopened for improper service" and updates the record type to BOFE Investigation
fieldUpdates.name: CM: Set Record Type to Investigation

fieldUpdates.name: CM: Update JEU Case Number

fieldUpdates.name: Change Status to Under Investigation

fieldUpdates.name: Clear Case Number

fieldUpdates.name: Clear Purge Date

fieldUpdates.formula: Employer__r.Name & " " & Assigned_Deputy__r.Name & " " & TEXT (Event_Type__c) & " " & TEXT( Event_Date__c) & " " & Stop_Order_Number__c & " " & Citation_Number__c & " " & Owner:User.LastName & " " & Owner:User.FirstName /* & " " & TEXT(Payment_Amount__c) & " " & Deputy_Number__c */

rules.fullName: CM - Attach PDF to PAGA Case
rules.description: Initiates Conga composer PDF generation of PAGA Case Document and attaches to Chatter once a PAGA Case is created.
Set the Case number for BOFE Case numbers when the case is created.
RCI Case Number
RCI

rules.fullName: CM - RCI Appeal Case No Activity
rules.description: 120 days

rules.formula: RecordType.Name="RCI" && Closed__c=FALSE && ISCHANGED(Assignment_Status__c) && ISPICKVAL(Assignment_Status__c, "Accept & Assign INV")

rules.description: Executes tasks for new WCA cases
Notify the Deputy of a new Case being assigned to them. Runs every time the Owner changes once the case is in Investigation Status
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && Contains ( RecordType.DeveloperName , 'BOFE') && ((ISPICKVAL (Status__c , "Under Investigation" )) || (ISPICKVAL (Status__c , "New" )) || (ISPICKVAL (Status__c , "Pending" )) || (ISPICKVAL (Status__c , "Reopened for improper service")))

rules.description: Notify the Deputy of a new Case being assigned to them when directly created
This workflow will set the status on a Case to Eligible for Closure if there are > 0 Violations on a Case, and the number of Open violations is zero

rules.fullName: CM Update Case Status to Closed
rules.description: When Sr.Deputy enter or update Case Closed Date, Status is updated to Closed
rules.formula: ((RecordType.DeveloperName="WCA" || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Garment' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Legacy_WCA_Case' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Legacy_Garment_Case') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Closure_Disposition__c,"")) && NOT(ISBLANK(Case_Closed_Date__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Purge_Date__c)) && IF( Hearings_Scheduled_on_Case__c > 0, true, NOT(ISBLANK(Resolution_Date__c)))) || ((RecordType.DeveloperName="BOFE Closed" || RecordType.DeveloperName="BOFE Inspection Request" || RecordType.DeveloperName="BOFE Intake" || RecordType.DeveloperName="BOFE") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Closure_Disposition__c,"")) && NOT(ISBLANK(Case_Closed_Date__c)) && Purge_Date__c>TODAY() && NOT(ISBLANK(Resolution_Date__c)))

rules.description: WCA Cases Notify the Deputy if no activity is made within 30 days
WCA Cases Notify the Deputy if no activity is made within 30

rules.fullName: CM WCA Set Status when deputy assigned
rules.description: For WCA/Garment cases, shen a Deputy is assigned, the system should change the case status to 'Under Investigation
rules.formula: ( RecordType.Name = "WCA" || RecordType.Name = "Garment" ) && NOT(ISBLANK(Assigned_Deputy__c)) && ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( Assigned_Deputy__c) )

rules.fullName: CM WCA%2FGarment Cases %3A Notify deputy if case is inactive for 30 days
rules.description: WCA/Garment Cases Notify the Deputy if no activity is made within 30 days
Sets deputy's email when deputy is changed in CM.
Notifies CIU public group members when a case has been referred to CIU using the "Refer to CIU" field.
Set the Case number for BOFE Case numbers when the case is created.
Brand new case being created, set status to "New"

rules.fullName: CM%3A Case Number set to blank
rules.description: When Assigned Deputy is cleared, clear the case number

rules.fullName: CM%3A Case Priority when key fields have changed
rules.description: Flags when Key fields have changed to trigger possible updates to priority level.
rules.formula: OR(Max_Employees_Affected__c >= 5, AND( EmployeesfromAccount__c >= 10, Worker_s_Comp_Violation__c = TRUE)) && Lock_Priority_from_Automatic_Updates__c = FALSE && OR(ISCHANGED( Max_Employees_Affected__c ),ISCHANGED( Meal_Rest_Break_Violation__c ) , ISCHANGED( Minimum_Wage_Violations__c ), ISCHANGED( IWC_Excemption_Request__c ), ISCHANGED( Overtime_Violations__c ), ISCHANGED( NSF_Low_Wage__c ), ISCHANGED( Child_Labor__c ), ISCHANGED( X2699_Case__c ), ISCHANGED( Cash_Pay_226__c ), ISCHANGED( Worker_s_Comp_Violation__c ), ISCHANGED( SB_869_RLLV_Source__c ), ISCHANGED( Pay_stub_violation__c ), ISCHANGED( WCA_Referral__c ), ISCHANGED( Community_Advocate_Group__c ), ISCHANGED( Trusted_Org_Referral__c ), ISCHANGED( Workers_to_Come_Forward__c ), ISCHANGED( Industry_Association_Referral__c ), ISCHANGED( Case_Source__c), ISCHANGED(Employer_Industry__c) )

rules.fullName: CM%3A Cases that are unable to pursue
rules.description: CM: When cases are set to the status of "unable to pursue", this workflow will identify those cases. There will be an attached field update that will update the record type to case closed.
Notify PAGA attorney of Cure Dispute Review Deadline ten days after a Cure Dispute is received.
Notify PAGA attorney of Cure Dispute Review Deadline 17 days after a Cure Dispute is received.
Set the Case number for JEU Case numbers when the case is created.

rules.fullName: CM%3A Manually Screening Indicator on PAGA Cases
rules.description: Update Manually Screened checkbox when the Case Status is set to "Waiting for Litigation"

rules.fullName: CM%3A Notify BOFE team when PAGA Case created and related to BOFE Case
rules.description: Notify the Assigned BOFE Deputy and Senior Deputy when a PAGA notice is created for an employee with an existing BOFE case.

rules.fullName: CM%3A Notify Senior of Aging Investigation Case
rules.description: Notify the Deputy and Sr. Deputy if no activity is made within 30 and 45 days once a case is under investigation.
Set the Case number for PAGA Case numbers when the case is created.

rules.fullName: CM%3A Populate Investigation Decision Deadline Date
rules.description: Populate the Investigation Decision Deadline Date on PAGA Cases as the Notice Filing Date plus 60 days.

rules.fullName: CM%3A RCI Withdrawn Case Auto closure

criteriaItems.value: Closed - JEU Referral,Closed - Enforcement Legal,Closed - No further action

rules.description: CM: When cases are re-opened due to improper service, this workflow will identify those cases. There will be an attached field update that will update the record type from case closed to Investigation.
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Reopened for improper service")&& RecordType.Name <> "BOFE Intake"

rules.description: Sets the RT to investigation when the status changes to Under Investigation
Sets the RT to investigation when the status changes to Under Investigation
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Under Investigation') && /* Record type is one of BOFE RTs */ ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Intake' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Inspection_Request' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Closed' )

rules.fullName: CM%3A Time-Based Notifications to BOFE Users to add Case Note re%3A Investigation Status
rules.description: 30-, 60-, and 90-day notifications to BOFE Assigned Deputy and Senior Deputy to add Case Note regarding the Investigation Status

rules.fullName: CM%3A Time-Based Notifications to PAGA Unit Screener to add Case Note re%3A Investigation Status
rules.description: 30-, 60-, and 90-day notifications to PAGA Unit Screener to add Case Note regarding the Investigation Status

rules.fullName: CM%3A Update Assigned PAGA Attorney Email Field
rules.description: Populate the "Assigned PAGA Attorney Email" field when the Assigned PAGA Attorney is set on a Case Management record.
Pre-populate from the Account object
Pre-populate fields from the Account object when case is created

If the owner of a case changes, the Case Accepted checkbox becomes unchecked and the new owner has 24 hours to check it again before being notified that they have yet to do so. This workflow sends a reminder email to the owner if not accepted.
rules.formula: NOT( ISBLANK ( Assigned_Deputy__c ) ) && NOT ( Case_Accepted__c ) && CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "BOFE")

rules.fullName: Case Acceptance Workflow - Owner ID Change
rules.description: This workflow monitors the owner of a particular case who has accepted said case; if the owner changes, the Case Accepted checkbox becomes unchecked and the new owner has 24 hours to check it again before being notified that they have yet to do so.
Creates a task for the Deputy upon the Hearing Date being entered on a case.
F0640: Notify the assigned deputy and senior deputy upon the case referral being rejected by JEU.

If a letter to collect response is not received in 10 days, notify the Deputy on the case to refer to JEU, if the case is not already Closed or Eligible for Closure (Usually caused by a payment to the Liabilities)
This workflow will set the status on a Case to Eligible for Closure if there are > 0 Violations on a Case, and the number of Open violations is zero

rules.fullName: Cases in Waiting for Litigation for one review
Change Status when closed date cleared
rules.description: When closed date is cleared change status to "Under Investigation" and clear Purge Date
rules.formula: ( RecordType.Name = "WCA" || RecordType.Name = "Garment") && ISCHANGED( Case_Closed_Date__c ) && ISNULL( Case_Closed_Date__c )

rules.fullName: Clear Purge Date when Case Closed Date is changed to Null
rules.description: Clear Purge Date when Case Closed Date is changed to Null
rules.formula: ISBLANK( Case_Closed_Date__c ) && ISCHANGED ( Case_Closed_Date__c ) && ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'WCA' || RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Garment' )

rules.description: Notifies PAGA Case Owner and PAGA Attorney group on cure dispute
Flags Cases for when the Postmark is edited to set the cure response deadline.
Flags when Deputy Notes are Changed to Clear "Log a note"
An Email Alert to plaintiff is sent when a new case is created

rules.fullName: Employer Name and Address in text
rules.description: May be refactored. Employer Names are sent to text field
May be refactored. Employer Names are sent to text field
When the Investigation Decision is made, the Deadline to complete the investigation is set.

rules.fullName: Locks Priority from Changes by new RLCVs
rules.description: 9-25: Updates a Hidden Field to prevent future changes from new RLCVs. Temporarily, it will use Damien's name but will be moved to integration user in production.

rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Screened / Pending Unit Review") || (ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Waiting for Litigation") && NOT(ISNEW())&& ISCHANGED(Status__c))

rules.description: Trigger outbound message when RCI case is created via form assembly.

rules.fullName: Set Deadline to Plus 120 Days on LC 2699
Set Paga queue to Case Owner

rules.description: Req 17386: Rule looks for Senior Deputy Review Comments. Accompanying Field update sets the date to Today when populated.
Workflow Rule for cases set to settlement pending so the PAGA attorney is aware.

rules.description: Update Legacy WCA, Legacy Garment Case Status/Case Stage to Investigation
Updates the date assigned field when case is accepted or assigned.
This will check to see if the case is assigned

If "WCA Referral" is TRUE, and the Status is not "Under Investigation", "Eligible for Closure", or "Closed", then the case owner will be notified they must take action on the case maximally after 5 days.
